dataList.dlg: Name's Heathcliff. Clobbering people is my specialty. 'Course, only when I fancy it.
Put that clock away from my face... It's bugging me.
What? Expecting me to ask what you had for lunch or some mince?
Now stop your gob, if you're thinking of ordering more trainings or missions, you'd best think twice.
Just because you're the manager, you don't get to lecture me or shove me into shoddy plans. I don't follow anyone's orders.
Don't you ever get curious about what's on the other side of that clock on your shoulders, mate? Hahah, I was joking around, what's got you shaking like timber?
There's no need for long chats between us. I'm not about to turn down an exchange of punches, though.
Alright, so you wanna get smacked, ey? Stay right there.
I was craving some workout. Time to smash stuff!
Don't make it long, I'm going in!
What? Why?
Already there!
Haha, how do ya like that?
Grh…!
Easy.
What, when'd you get smashed to bits?
What’s that proud look? I’m the one who dealt with it.
...This is really narking me. Didn’t I tell you to get someone else?
Well, I don't wanna giggle over small victories.
Heh, see that? I crushed 'em to a pulp!
Dammit, this got me pure raging! You ain't gonna let this go, right, mate?
